p: Column F shows daily requirement of drug (mg) based on a surge number of 90. Column G shows the daily surge output (mg), factoring in the percentage uptake (column C) and percentage usage split (column D) from figure 1, that is, column G=column F × (column C × column D). Finally, the surge output requirement for a full ICU stay is given in column H, that is, surge output/day (column G) × average treatment length (column E) from figure 1.
